root.name: Coraline: The Game
root.description: GameplayPlayers will be able to explore two 3-D worlds while playing Coraline: The normal world, and the surreal "other world".Â While exploring and fighting against the evil plots of those in the other world, mini-games will appear in which Coraline will be able to unravel parts of the mystery, as well as earn items (including buttons, which function as the game's currency).
